thread.title: Which 'special' play was your favorite in the LSU-Florida game?
thread.title_full: Which 'special' play was your favorite in the LSU-Florida game? | NOLA.com

author: John Roach, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Which 'special' play was your favorite in the LSU-Florida game?
text:
The Mad Hatter was at it again Saturday against Florida. That explains why LSU's Les Miles perhaps was playing it so vanilla in its earlier games -- the Tigers were saving them for the Gators.
The game involved a flea flicker, a Wildcat touchdown run, and LSU kicker Trent Domingue running in for a score on a fake FG -- and of course kicking his own extra point.
Which play was your favorite? Vote in the poll and add your comments below.
